strings.Value: "Dawnflower, don't turn your gaze from me! I need your power to help those who suffer."
"The fire of my prayers has fallen to embers. I address my plea to you, Dawnflower — grant me the strength to serve you."
"I like to listen when you pray. A pure voice, and a pure soul."
"You wasted all your prayers again? Good. Now you'll need to learn how to use weapons properly."
"All your prayers are always about serving, and helping others. This… brings to my mind many things. I think upon those things that separate sincerity and vanity."
"Oh goddess, give me your strength... Because I have none of my own, ha, ha, ha!"
